name: Warriors of Seconds
description:
How to play:

-You move with wasd or the arrow keys

-You Shoot clicking on the enemy

The warriors of seconds are the greatest superhero team in the planet, but they have a problem, their superhero costumes only last 10 seconds before running out of batteries so they have to take turns in the middle of the fight.

Help them protect the city against danger and villany.

Developed by Agustin Bosco
